column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I was in Chicago for a couple of days so I didn't get a chance to try too many pizza joints. Sad to say I thought Lou Malnati's was pretty underwhelming
column2: especially considering the long wait. Maybe it was the pizza we ordered (pepperoni and sausage). The sausage wasn't so great. I'm obviously not going to judge a city's pizza by one meal; I hope the next experience I have of the pizza changes my mind.
